stories.text:
In September 2020, I started https://www.boxpiper.com/ blog with the single aim to provide high-quality content on Tech, Product, Money, Books and Life. Today it has reached a milestone! 1.11 Million impressions as per GSC. Still, a lot many things to achieve!

Happy to discuss all the things that I can improve and how I can be of help.

Google Search Console Snapshot: https://ik.imagekit.io/nhprvzwvp3t/constant/Screenshot_2021-07-20_at_01.02.55_EMxhDM5It.png

Ahrefs data Snapshot : https://ik.imagekit.io/nhprvzwvp3t/constant/Screenshot_2021-07-20_at_01.22.03_627zYMmnq.png

PS: Box Piper is on Discord! Let's connect! https://discord.gg/kD7GbgGT Here we hang around with Tech, Product, Money, Books, Life and share interesting ideas and sometimes mind-boggling ideas! Let's have fun!
stories.title: Reached 1.11M impressions for my blog as per GSC in 10 months
Technologies You Need to Be Aware of (2020)
Betteromics is hiring software engineers to accelerate life science research

stories.text:
Hi all,

Our mobile app has surpassed 250k MAU (monthly active users) and our home grown communications service designed when we had approx 10k MAU is lagging behind.

Our communications service is responsible for sending transactional in-app and e-mail notifications.

We are evaluating two alternatives:

1) Redesign our communications service

2) Integrate with a CRM product (offloading some development)

So, how are you managing communications with your userbase? Can you share your learnings in using one or the other approach, specially with regards to usability, development flexibility and cost?

Thanks in advance!
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you manage communication with your userbase?
